title: Ciudad Deportiva del Real Zaragoza
text:
The Ciudad Deportiva del Real Zaragoza is the <a href="training%20ground">training ground</a> and <a href="Football%20academy">academy</a> base of the <a href="Spain">Spanish</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> club <a href="Real%20Zaragoza">Real Zaragoza</a>. It was opened in 1974 by the efforts of then-club president <a href="Jose%20Angel%20Zalba">Jose Angel Zalba</a>. It was designed by architect <a href="Julio%20Descart%C3%ADn">Julio Descartín</a>.
Located in <a href="Cuarte%20de%20Huerva">Cuarte de Huerva</a> 8 km south of Zaragoza and covering an area of 150,000 m², it is used for youth and senior teams trainings.
Currently, the coordinator of the Ciudad Deportiva is Pedro Suñén.
